name: Penguin Heroes
text:
1 Tuner + 1+ non-Tuner monsters
Your opponent cannot target your face-down Defense Position monsters with card effects. You can only use each of the following effects of "Penguin Heroes" once per turn.
? If this card is Synchro Summoned: You can Special Summon 1 "Penguin" monster from your Deck in face-down Defense Position.
? When your opponent activates a monster effect (Quick Effect): You can change 1 of your face-down Defense Position WATER monsters to face-up Defense Position.
